meanings.sent1: The crudy old car was covered in dirt and grime.
meanings.sent2: The kitchen floor looked crudy after the kids spilled juice all over it.
meanings.sent3: The crudy puppy rolled around in the mud and made a mess.
meanings.sent4: Her crudy painting was a masterpiece of chaos and color.
meanings.sent5: The crudy walls of the abandoned house seemed to whisper secrets of neglect.

meanings.definition: Of poor quality or in bad condition.
meanings.sent1: The crudy toy broke after just a few minutes of play.
meanings.sent2: The crudy old couch sagged in the middle from years of use.
meanings.sent3: His crudy attempt at cooking ended with a burnt mess in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The crudy weather ruined our plans for a picnic in the park.
meanings.sent5: The crudy phone reception made it impossible to have a clear conversation.
